mapper.select: SELECT a.device_id , a.device_latitude , a.device_longitude , b.data_type , b.data_content , b.server_time FROM gztls_device a JOIN ( SELECT device_id , data_type , data_content , server_time FROM gztls_success WHERE server_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{server_time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY device_id , data_type , data_content ) b WHERE a.device_id = b.device_id;
